translations: adj.[地理] 南非干旱台地的

phrs.translation: 卡鲁, 台地高原, 干旱高原, 雨季草原
南非小高原, 小卡鲁, 小卡鲁高原
克林克鲁, 克林卡鲁
卡鲁盆地, 卡罗盆地

sentences.sentence: The Karoo Array Telescope (KAT-7) consists of seven steerable dishes, each 12 metres across.
sentences.translation: 南部高原列阵望远镜(KAT - 7)包含7个可控制的碟形装置，每个直径12米。

sentences.sentence: If true, this would mean that the Karoo ice age operated in much the same way as the current one.
sentences.translation: 如果那是事实，这就意味着Karoo冰河时期与现在冰川的运作方式基本相同。

sentences.sentence: It is during the cool, dry winter months that aloes become a striking feature of the South African Bushveld, Highveld and Karoo.
sentences.translation: 一到寒冷干燥的冬季，芦荟便成为了南非灌木草原，高地草原及卡鲁地区中一道醒目的风景。
